PLAYER HEIGHT WEIGHT DOB PLACE OF BIRTH 29 Marc-Andre Fleury 6' 2" 180 Nov 28, 1984 Sorel, QC, CAN 1 Brent Johnson 6' 3" 199 Mar 12, 1977 Farmington, MI, USA PENGUINS' STATS: Quote: http://penguins.nhl.com/club/stats.htm FLYERS-PENGUINS' SERIES HISTORY: Current and Miscellaneous: The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season record is 136-80-30-6 including 3-1-0-0 this season. The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season home record is 90-25-8-3. The Flyers are 1-5-0-1 in the last seven. The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season road record is 46-55-22-3. The Flyers are 4-2-0-2 in the last eight. The road team has won 10 of the last 13 regular season games. The Flyers have won three (1989, 1997, 2000) PO series and lost two (2008 and 2009) The Flyers are 15-14 (8-6 home and 7-8 away) in 29 PO games.
